title: threat group
extract: Security Threat Group (STG) Law and Legal Definition. Security Threat Group (STG) is a formal or informal group of prison inmates. ... Law enforcement officials use the term Security Threat Group to refer such gangs in order to take away the recognition that the term “gang” connotes.
